mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Rogers, Eli
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Rone Co., VA [Roane County, West Virginia]
Spencer, Rone Co., VA [Spencer, Roane County, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Rogers, Eli Patient Age: 19. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound of right side. Bullet entering 6 inches below right nipple and 2 inches to the right of the inner border of the cartilage of ribs passing between integuments and ribs. Direction outward to exit 3 inches above crest of illium [ilium]. From entrance to exit 5 inches. . Location Wounded: In act[ion] at Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/20. Nature of Wound: Bullet. Result: Tranferred to Parkersburg 1864/09/24.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Rogers, Eli

Gun shot flesh wound of right side. Bullet entering 6 inches below right nipple and 2 inches to the right of the inner border of the cartilage of ribs passing between integuments and ribs. Direction outward to exit 3 inches above crest of illium [ilium]. From entrance to exit 5 inches.
